title: dabbawalla - Ayurveda Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Organic, Salad bar, Take-out
description: This little place opened March 2015 around the Winterfeldtplatz. Serves food based on Ayurvedic dietetics. Main dish of the day is the thali (uses ghee) with once a week a vegan thali. A variety of salads at the salad bar (vegan). Makes chai tea.
